Name: tls.sni
Description: sticky buffer to match specifically and only on the TLS SNI

Name: tls.certs
Description: sticky buffer to match the TLS certificate

Name: tls.cert_issuer
Description: sticky buffer to match specifically and only on the TLS cert issuer

Name: tls.cert_subject
Description: sticky buffer to match specifically and only on the TLS cert subject

Name: tls.cert_serial
Description: sticky buffer to match the TLS cert serial

Name: tls.cert_fingerprint
Description: sticky buffer to match on the TLS cert fingerprint

Name: ja3.hash
Description: sticky buffer to match the JA3 hash

Name: ja3.string
Description: sticky buffer to match the JA3 string

Name: ja3s.hash
Description: sticky buffer to match the JA3S hash

Name: ja3s.string
Description: sticky buffer to match the JA3S string
